Proc_A.help: You select a random target across the battlefield. A field of tuned death energy forms at their feet, terrifying the target and all around them.

Proc_B.help: You select a random target across the battlefield. A field of tuned death energy forms at their feet, weakening the target and all around them, which reduces their chance to hit, combat speed, range and healing effectiveness.
Proc_B.targetHelp: You have been weakened and are suffering reduced chance to hit, combat speed, range and healing effectiveness.

messages.victimHit: You are weakened by {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName} and suffer reduced chance to hit, combat speed, range and healing effectiveness.

Proc_C.help: You select a random target across the battlefield. A field of tuned death energy forms at their feet, reducing the damage output of the target and all around them.
Proc_C.targetHelp: Your damage output has been reduced.

messages.victimHit: Your damage output has been reduced by {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.

Proc_D.help: You create a field around yourself. This field causes damage to all opponents within it and heals you. The damage and healing effects end when the target leaves the field.
Proc_D.targetHelp: Mot's residual energy enables Diabolique to drain energy from the captured Heroes and channel it to herself and her enforcer, the Sentinel.

messages.victimHit: You are struck by {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName} and suffer {Damage} points of cold damage.

Proc_D_Field.help: You create a field around yourself. This field causes damage to all opponents within it and heals you. The damage and healing effects end when the target leaves the field.
Proc_D_Field.targetHelp: Mot's residual energy enables Diabolique to drain energy from the captured Heroes and channel it to herself and her enforcer, the Sentinel.

messages.victimHit: You are caught within the Sentinel's {PowerName} and suffer {Damage} points of cold damage.
You are caught within the Sentinel's {PowerName} and suffer {Damage} points of negative energy damage.

Proc_E.help: You create a massive pulse of death energy around an enemy target. This causes damage to the target and all caught near them.
Proc_E.targetHelp: You have been hit by a pulse of death energy.

messages.victimHit: You suffer {Damage} points of annihilative damage due to {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.
You suffer {Damage} points of resistible negative energy damage due to {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.
You suffer {Damage} points of resistible cold damage due to {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.
You suffer {Damage} points of defensible cold damage due to {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.

Proc_F.help: You select a random target across the battlefield. A field of tuned death energy forms at their feet, draining the endurance of the target and all around them. You also reduce all afflicted target's recovery rate.
Proc_F.targetHelp: Your endurance is being drained and your recovery is reduced.

messages.victimHit: You are suffering from reduced recovery and are losing endurance due to {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.

Proc_G.help: You select a random target across the battlefield. A field of tuned death energy forms at their feet, freezing the target and all around them.
